sentences.sContent: This functionality works well as a recursive application, as shown in the sample factorial function in  Listing 4.
sentences.sContent_eng: This functionality works well as a recursive application, as shown in the sample factorial function in Listing 4.
sentences.sCn: 这个功能作为递归应用程序工作良好，如  清单 4中的样本阶乘函数所示。

sentences.sContent: Here is an implementation of a factorial calculator, where we use a conventional technique of calling a second, nested method to do the work.
sentences.sContent_eng: Here is an implementation of a factorial calculator, where we use a conventional technique of calling a second, nested method to do the work.
sentences.sCn: 这里是一个阶乘计算器的实现，我们会使用一种常规的方法，通过调用第二个，嵌套的方法来完成计算。

sentences.sContent: The test case consists of some simple command argument processing followed by a loop that calculates the factorial of the specified values (if any).
sentences.sContent_eng: The test case consists of some simple command argument processing followed by a loop that calculates the factorial of the specified values (if any).
sentences.sCn: 测试用例包含几个简单的命令参数处理，然后是一个循环，它计算指定值（如果有的话）的阶乘。

words.tran: [数] 因子分解，[数] 因式分解；保付代理
[数] 因子分解；[数] 因式分解
把…因素包括进去（factor的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: of or involving factorials or factors
the result when you multiply a whole number by all the numbers below it
